camera_and_perspective.view_angle: Medium Aerial Shot, 45Â° Isometric-like angle, Focused on building block
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: 35mm equivalent, Rectilinear lens, Minimal distortion, High clarity, Slight perspective compression to stack foreground and background
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Hyperfocal distance, Sharpness throughout the architectural subject

lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Blue Hour, Civil Twilight (Sky is cyan/blue, not black)
lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Soft Cool Ambient Skylight mixing with Punchy Warm Artificial Lights, High Contrast between indoor warm glow and outdoor cool air
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Soft, cool-toned ambient shadows (Blue cast), No harsh black shadows, diffuse shading

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: High-intensity warm retail glow (3000K) spilling out from glass, High transparency (See-through effect), Visible interior structure/shelves
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Glowing glass features, Linear vertical LED strips on buildings, Wall-washing downlights on solid masonry facades

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Long Exposure Light Trails (Streaks of red tail lights and white headlights), Street lamps casting warm pools on asphalt
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Street trees illuminated by streetlights, dark green canopy contrasting with warm pavement
landscape_lighting.water_feature_effects: N/A (Focus on reflective glass surfaces instead of water)

color_and_grading.palette_theme: Complementary Blue & Gold, Cool Cyan/Blue Sky vs Warm Amber/Orange Streets and Interiors
color_and_grading.temperature: Cool Balance (6500K) environment with localized Warm Tungsten (2800K) highlights
color_and_grading.post_processing: Long Exposure Simulation (Motion Blur on cars), High Vibrance, Clean Denoise, Digital Sharpening, Commercial real estate aesthetic

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: Corona Renderer (LightMix), V-Ray 6 (Motion Blur settings), Unreal Engine 5
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic Commercial Architectural Photography, Urban Nightscape
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Hyper-realistic glass refraction, Detailed asphalt textures

environment_textures.ground_surface: Asphalt roads with motion-blurred traffic lights reflection, Concrete sidewalks, clearly marked pedestrian crossings
environment_textures.foliage_style: Row of street trees, dense canopy, urban landscaping
